搥字的基本解释

搥
chuí
同“捶”。

搥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuí］
［《字彙》直追切］
(1)敲击。
(2)鼓槌。
[②]［duī］
［《廣韻》都回切，平灰，端。］
掷。

搥字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搥； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页447第19
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?都回切，音堆。【廣韻】擿也。【增韻】擲也。【揚子·法言】搥提仁義。或作?。　又【正韻】直追切，音椎。擊也。【唐書·禮樂志】日未明，四刻搥一鼓，爲一嚴。二刻搥二鼓，爲再嚴。一刻搥三鼓，爲三嚴。【韓愈詩】作樂鼓還搥。別作槌。又與捶通。

搥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
搥字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　捶; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 447 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? All cut back, sound pile. [Guang Yun] Gai Ye. [Zeng Yun] Throw also. 【Yangtze·Fayan】Thanks to benevolence and righteousness. Or for?.　[Zheng Yun] Go straight to the cut, the sound cone. Hit also. [Tang Shu·Liyuezhi] The day is unknown, beat a drum in four quarters, and be strict. Beat two drums at two quarters, for the more strict. Beat three drums in one moment for three stricts. [Han Yushi] Playing drums and beating. Don't be a mallet. Again with thumping.
